episode_event_pasiosalon_date_ch0089_00_: What a coincidence, running into you here.

Why don’t we take this opportunity to have a
chat? After all, it’s just the two of us.
Do you mind if I ask you something?

What was your life like growing
up, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?

[Name:PlayerNickname ] told N about
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] childhood...
I see... Thanks for sharing that with me.

As for me... From the moment Ghetsis took me in,
I was raised according to his intentions.

I was kept inside Team Plasma’s castle, side by
side with Pokémon that had been hurt by humans.
That was my whole world when I was young.

I knew nothing of the wide world outside with all
its varied scenery and the chemical reactions that
bring about differing ideas.

But my world expanded when I met Hilbert and
others in Unova.

And those encounters made me realize how
narrow my viewpoint had been before.
Then I came to Pasio and met you.

You remind me of Hilbert, and yet I sense different
possibilities within you.

And by meeting you and getting to know
you better...

I’ve come to truly believe that I can achieve
my dream here.
And the reason is...
No... I’ll leave that subject for another time.

Maybe next time I can even show you one of my
favorite views.
I’ll be sure to invite you again then.

Anyhow, see you
later, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Well? Were you surprised?

To think that such a fine ferris wheel could just
pop up here on Pasio...

Apparently this is a traveling amusement park that
Lear invited here.

So it’ll all be packed up and taken away after
a while.

I really wanted to bring you here before
that happened.

Oh, right... I should continue where I left off
last time.

Pasio’s a wonderful place. People and Pokémon
live together while supporting each other as
sync pairs.

But as you know, not all the relationships here are
such rosy ones.

There are also some cruel Trainers who treat their
Pokémon like mere tools to be used.
And so I felt myself waver.

Was my formula for bridging the gap between
humans and Pokémon really correct?

But when I saw you and how much you care
about Pokémon, my doubts vanished.

And your partner Pokémon said it liked you. It said
it wanted to be with you.
So I know this is no mistake.

If I keep spending time with people like you and
Hilbert, I’m sure I can realize my dream.
I’d like to help you.
Thank you. You must feel the same way I do.
I’m sure you can do it.

Thank you. I swear I’ll live up to
your expectations.

You gave me courage when I was about to
lose heart.

So, if you ever find yourself losing hope
or struggling...
I promise to come and help you.
Because you are my dear friend!
